headline: CoStar Group (CSGP): Revisiting Valuation After a Year of Share Price Underperformance
summary: CoStar Group (CSGP) has quietly drifted over the past year, with the stock down about 12% even as revenue and earnings continue to grow. That disconnect naturally raises a valuation question for long term investors. See our latest analysis for CoStar Group. The share price has been choppy rather than catastrophic, with a roughly 22% 90 day share price decline and a 12% one year total shareholder return loss, suggesting sentiment is cooling even as the business keeps growing into its...
